instruments.en: Welcome to StudentHelperüßë‚Äçüíª - your personal academic assistant in solving educational problems üìöTo select the operating mode, just click on the buttons belowüòäüîß

code_helper.en: Welcome to StudentHelperüßë‚Äçüíª - your personal academic assistant in writing and editing code, glad to welcome you! üîªDear user! To effectively help you solve your coding problem, please provide the following information: ‚Ä¢ Programming language. ‚Ä¢ Purpose and functionality of the code. ‚Ä¢ The code you wrote (even if it does not work). ‚Ä¢ Description of the specific problem (errors, incorrect result). ‚Ä¢ Descriptions of your attempts to find a solution (search results). ‚úîÔ∏è I can help with debugging, algorithm development, code optimization, explanation of concepts and tool recommendations.

chart_creator_helper.en: Welcome to StudentHelperüßë‚Äçüíª - your personal academic assistant in constructing various types of graphs, glad to welcome you! ‚ùóÔ∏è In order for me to solve your problem, you need to click the ¬´Construct graph¬ª button

chart_creator_rules.en: Write what graph to draw and I will send it to you. ‚úîÔ∏èYou can specify the function and the boundaries along the x-axis [x from -1 to 1] and along the y-axis [y from -1 to 1]. üìà I can draw the following graphs: - graph of a linear function (y=a*x+b) - graph of a quadratic function (y=a*x^2+b*x+c) - graph of a cubic function (y=x^3) - graph of high-degree polynomial functions (y=a*x^3+b*x^2+c*x+d) - graph of a function with a root (y=sqrt(x)) - graph of a hyperbola (y=1/x) - graph of an exponential function (y=exp(1)^x) - graph of a logarithmic function (y=log(x)) - graph of trigonometric functions (y=sin(x), y=cos(x), y=tg(x), y=ctg(x)) - graph of inverse trigonometric functions (y=arcsin(x), y=arccos(x), y=arctg(x), y=arcctg(x)) üîªRules for entering functions: 1. All variables are expressed through x 2. All mathematical operations are expressed through the generally accepted symbols +, -, *, /, ^ 3. Square root ‚àö¬Ø ‚â° sqrt, degree of the root ‚â° x^(2/3), (x-1)^(1/3), number œÄ ‚â° pi, number e ‚â° exp(1), ‚àû ‚â° infinity, e^x= exp(x), log5(x) ‚â° log(x,5) 4. Trigonometric functions: cos(x), sin(x), tg(x), ctg(x), arccos(x), arcsin(x), arctg(x), arcctg(x)

chart_creator_done_chart.en: Your function has been plotted‚úÖ Thank you for choosing our Service! Best regards, Team @student_helpergpt_botüë®‚Äçüíª. ‚ùóThe solution is not the final result and may require adjustments.

default_mode_helper.en: Welcome to StudentHelperüßë‚Äçüíª - your personal academic assistant in any matter, glad to welcome you! ‚úîÔ∏èAsk any question/example/task/topic and I will solve everything you say! For input, you can use üìùtext; üì∏photos. As soon as you select the mode, ask any question!

pptx_helper_welcome.en: Welcome to StudentHelperüßë‚Äçüíª - your personal academic assistant in Creating presentations, glad to welcome you! ‚ùóÔ∏è In order for me to create a presentation for you, you need to click the ¬´Generate presentation¬ª button

pptx_helper_topic_request.en: Great! Describe the topic of a Presentation you want to generate. For example: ‚úîÔ∏è ¬´The World of dinosaurs¬ª

pptx_settings.en: ‚öôÔ∏è Specify the necessary presentation settings: üé≠ Topic: {plain_text} üåê Presentation language: {language} üóÇ Number of slides: {length} üé® Design: {template}üì£ Audience: {tone} üñº Images: {fetch_images} üóíÔ∏è Verbosity: {verbosity}

rewriting_finish.en: üìù Your work is ready! You can download the file with your work below. Thank you for choosing our service! Best regards, The @student_helpergpt_bot teamüë®‚Äçüíª. ‚ùóThe file is not the final result and requires further revision.

abstract_manual_plan.en: At this stage, it is necessary to form the correct structure of the work. ‚úîÔ∏è To do this, you need to send me a plan compiled as follows: * Chapter + Sub-chapter - Point - Point + Sub-chapter - Point - Point And so on‚Ä¶

The tariff is valid for 7 days.

anti_plagiat_start.en:
Hello! Welcome to StudentHelper, your personal assistant. I will check your text for plagiarism and AI-generated fragments. The check is conducted across the complete database in the AntiPlagiarism system. No registration is required.
Safe.
Your work will not be indexed or flagged in the Duplicate Detector.

To get started, upload a file in docx or pdf format, weighing up to 100MB. I will return a full report to you. The average verification time is 5-7 minutes.
